help_info.header: What is the purpose of the site?
help_info.description: A place where you can record and share your travel stories with the world! Or you can view other spectacular stories and travel destinations from other people.

help_info.header: Can I view travel diaries without an account?
How can I make an account?
help_info.description: Click on 'Create Account' on the home screen, or simply choose 'Sign In' from the menu bar.

help_info.header: Why am I limited on the search results?
help_info.description: The development team is currently working on the entire website. Please bear with us as we are doing our best to allow you to have the best experience!

help_info.header: Some of the features are not working!
help_info.description: Please bear with us as we are doing our best to complete the website!
